lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Of particular interest is the controversial Penrod-72 system being operated by the Dallas-based Hunt brothers who last year placed Placid Oil under bankruptcy court protection in order to avoid foreclosures on its valuable oil properties.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Geer said the industry was particularly interested in the Green Canyon field offshore Louisiana where a number of companies, including Shell, a unit of Royal Dutch/Shell <RD>, Dupont Co's <DD> Conoco Inc, USX Corp's <X> Marathon Oil Co, Standard Oil Co <SRD> and <Placid Oil Co>, are working, many of them testing new deep-water technologies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They have been seeking the right to use assets to drill oil wells in the Green Canyon through Penrod, arguing that continued development of the project is essential to their ability to get out of their financial crisis.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Of particular interest is the controversial Penrod-72 system being operated by the Dallas-based Hunt brothers who last year placed Placid Oil under bankruptcy court protection in order to avoid foreclosures on its valuable oil properties.

lst.str:

Conoco Inc, USX Corp's Marathon Oil Co, Standard Oil Co and <Placid Oil Co>, are working, many of them testing new deep-water technologies.
